# Past Reports

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| 
import os

# archive_dir = "docs/archive" # originally it was this line
archive_dir = "archive"

# only proceed if folder exists
if os.path.isdir(archive_dir):
    reports = sorted(os.listdir(archive_dir), reverse=True)
    for r in reports:
        print(f"- [{r}](archive/{r})")
else:
    print("No archived reports yet.")
```
